mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT v.id, (SELECT count(id) FROM dqsj_sm_vote_option a WHERE a.voteId = v.id) as optionCount, (SELECT count(id) FROM dqsj_fe_vote_user_detail b WHERE b.voteId = v.id) as votedCount, v.voteTitle, v.votePicUrl, v.voteBackPicUrl, v.voteDescribe, v.voteStartTime, v.voteEndTime, v.stateFlag, v.userTypeFlag, v.stateFlag, v.isLimitUser, v.periodHour, v.voteNumber, v.voteRule, v.voteOrder, v.updateDate FROM dqsj_sm_vote v WHERE v.deleteFlag = '0' and v.id = '${voteId}' ORDER BY v.voteOrder ASC, v.updateDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dqsj_sm_vote ( id, voteTitle, voteOrder, voteDescribe, stateFlag, votePicUrl, voteBackPicUrl, voteStartTime, voteEndTime, createDate, createUserId, updateDate, updateUserId, deleteFlag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{voteTitle}, #{voteOrder}, #{voteDescribe}, #{stateFlag}, #{votePicUrl}, #{voteBackPicUrl}, #{voteStartTime}, #{voteEndTime}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUserId}, #{deleteFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dqsj_sm_vote SET voteTitle= #{voteTitle}, voteOrder= #{voteOrder}, voteBackPicUrl = #{voteBackPicUrl}, voteDescribe= #{voteDescribe}, votePicUrl= #{votePicUrl}, voteStartTime= #{voteStartTime}, voteEndTime= #{voteEndTime}, updateDate= #{updateDate}, updateUserId= #{updateUserId} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE dqsj_sm_vote SET userTypeFlag = #{userTypeFlag}, periodHour = #{periodHour}, voteNumber= #{voteNumber}, voteRule= #{voteRule}, updateDate= #{updateDate}, updateUserId= #{updateUserId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dqsj_fe_vote_user_detail ( id, voteUserId, voteId, voteOptionId, createDate, createUserId, updateDate, updateUserId, deleteFlag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{voteUserId}, #{voteId}, #{voteOptionId}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUserId}, #{deleteFlag} )
